A strange face may seem unpleasant or painful to him at this moment of sorrow; besides, what can I say to him now, when my heart fails me and my mouth feels dry at the mere sight of him?" Not one of the innumer- able speeches addressed to the Emperor that he had composed in his imagination could he now recall.
